select ifnull(sum(a.commission_amount), 0) as commissionAmount, ifnull(sum(e.amount), 0) as amount, d.id as userId, c.id as actingId from acting_commission_detail a left join acting_hierarchy_relation b on a.create_by = b.create_by left join acting c on c.id = b.acting_id left join sys_user d on c.create_by = d.id left join recharge_detail e on d.id = e.create_by where 1 = 1
and c.phone = #{request.phone}
and b.user_id = #{request.userId}
group by b.id
order by amount
order by amount desc
order by commissionAmount
order by commissionAmount desc

select a.lower_level_id as userId, b.level as actingLevel, c.commission_amount as commissionAmount, d.create_date as createDate, e.sumTotal as amount from acting_hierarchy_relation a left join acting b on a.acting_id = b.id left join acting_commission_detail c on a.create_by = c.create_by left join sys_user d on a.create_by = d.id left join (select (sum(amount)) as sumTotal, create_by from grab_red_packets) e on a.create_by = e.create_by where a.superior_id = #{request.userId}
